|brand = QNAP |model = TS-221 |submodelappend = yes |submodel = TurboNAS |revision = <!-- Model Revision, Leave blank for none or unknown --> |subrevision = <!-- Model Subrevision, Leave blank for none or unknown --> |model_part_num = |page_start_date = 11/30/2023 |page_start_origon = https://wikidevi.wi-cat.ru/QNAP_TS-221 |series = <!-- Device series --> |type = NAS enclosure |sernum = <!-- First 4 or so for easy version identification --> |fcc_id = <!-- Federal Communication Commission Identification Number --> |icid = <!-- Industry Canada Identification number, Leave blank for unknown --> |us_id = <!-- US ID number --> |boardid = FKN-20006-A01259-YS-RS |ecc_id = <!-- eec-id -->
|cpu1chip1 = Marvell;88F6282;Armada 300; |cpu1_cores = 1 |cpu1_type = ARMv5<!-- TE --> |cpu1_type_rev = <!-- CPU1 type Revision, Leave blank for unknown --> |cpu1spd = 2.0 GHz <!-- 1.2 / 1.6 / 2.0 GHz --> |is_doc = |bus = <!-- 8-bit, 16-bit, 32-bit, 64-bit, Leave blank for none -->
|flash1type = SPI NOR |fla1_num = <!-- 1,2,3,4 --> |fla1chip = STMicro;M25P28V6P; |flash1size = 16 |flash1maxsize = <!-- Maximum size firmware can be in bytes -->
|ram1type = DDR3 |ram1type1 = SDRAM |ram1spd = <!-- RAM speed --> |ram1size = 1 GiB |ram1chip = SK hynix;H5TQ2G83CFR-H9C; |ram1_num = 4 |nvramsize = <!-- 32, 60, 64, etc... in kb, Leave blank for unknown -->
|eth_cpu = true |eth2chip = Marvell;88E1318; |lan_ports = 1 |lan_speed = 1GbE |ethstandard = <!-- auto --> |auto_mdix = <!-- mdix support --> |sup_jumbo = <!-- Jumbo frames support --> |ethoui = 00:08:9B
|bootwait = <!-- On or Off, Leave blank for unknown --> |stockbootloader = <!-- Name;Version;Distro --> |stockos = <!-- Name;Version;Distro -->

|serial = yes,, 4-pin header,, populated,, 3.3V TTL,, (115200 8N1),, CN1 |jtag = <!-- Full JTAG info -->

|defaulip = 169.254.100.100 |defaultlogin = admin |defaultpass = admin |manuf = <!-- Manufacturer --> |manuf_model = <!-- Manufacturer Model --> |manuf_rev = <!-- Manufacturer Revision --> |is_manuf = No |tpfirmware = Debian

|buttons = <!-- buttons available --> |led = <!-- Led colors and descriptions --> |dimensions = <!-- Size of device {{convert |length|x|widthordepth|x|height|in|mm}} --> |weight = <!-- Weight of device {{convert|weight|oz|g}} -->
}}{{TIDTOC|embedded}} ==Overview== "FKN-20006-A01259-YS-RS", "QU48" and "V1.6" are silkscreened on the board.
{{See also|QNAP|List of NAS Devices}}
===Hardware specification=== *CPU: [[Marvell]] 88F6282 @2.0GHz (''Armada 300'' ARM V5) *Memory: 1GB (DDR3) SDRAM *Storage: 16MB (SPI NOR) Flash, 2x SATA II, 2x eSATA 2.0 *Network: 1x Gigabit Ethernet port *USB: 1x USB 2.0 (Type A), 2x USB 3.0 (Type A) *Power: 12V/5A via barrel
==Links of Interest== *[https://www.qnap.com/en-us/download?model=ts-221 Download Center]
===Reviews=== *[https://www.smallnetbuilder.com/nas/nas-reviews/qnap-ts-x21-nas-series-reviewed/ ''QNAP TS-x21 NAS Series Reviewed'' on '''SmallNetBuilder'''] *[https://www.geeks3d.com/20131008/qnap-ts-221-4tb-nas-review/ ''Qnap TS-221 4TB NAS Quick Review'' on '''Geeks3D'''] *[https://www.nikktech.com/main/articles/peripherals/network/nas-servers/1901-qnap-turbonas-ts-221-nas-server ''QNAP TurboNAS TS-221 NAS Server Review'' on '''NiKK Tech''']
